name: i-librarian
tagline: A web-based reference and document manager for researchers with PDF storage and citations
description: I Librarian is a web based reference and document manager for researchers. It stores PDFs, annotations and bibliographic data, supports full text search and citation export, and can be deployed as a private literature database.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Store and organize research papers and documents in a centralized library

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Highlight and annotate PDFs directly within the web interface

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export bibliographic data in BibTeX, RIS, and other citation formats

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Categorize documents with custom tags for easy organization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution for complete control over your research library
